title: 1 Parking Space - Storage Room  -  Private Patio
posting_body: 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, kitchen, dishwasher, disposal, living room-dining room combo.
The oversized living room-dining room opens with sliding doors to a private patio and common garden area.
Both bedrooms are large with ample storage/closets spaces.
The master bedroom features a wall length closet.
Includes 1 parking space and private storage room.
There is also a common laundry room.
This condo is part of a 17-unit condominium association at the end of Newman Road that borders the Malden Greenway walking trail.
The property features mature trees, and a private parking area.
It is professionally managed, including landscaping, snow removal, and weekly common area maintenance.
1 Queen Size Bed, 2 twin beds and a 48" flat screen tv in unit, if needed.
Terms: First Month Rent, Security Deposit, Half Month Broker's Fee. 1 year fixed-term lease with option to renew.
For viewing, contact First Estate Realty: (857)928-5557.
